#summary Following are the steps to build the servers, examples and tests

= Installation and Building =

  # Define an environment variable (either in delphi/tools/environment or system environment) *DelphiFit*. Define it to point to the root folder where you have expanded the zip files into
  {{{
	e.g DelphiFit="c:\Source\fit4delphi"
  }}}
  # Load the fitServers.bpg project group to delphi
  # Do a build all.

Next you can run unit tests (around 60) and check if system works

You can run Fitnesse test using web browser by running fitnesse server 'runfitnesse.bat' and then typing address http://localhost:8888/DelphiSuite
